messages.message:
Crystal
So we have a hotel room but I marked us down for two people not four (bad Crystal!). Two beds, four nights. Anyways with tax its 97 per night so how bouts we each pay Brian 100... even it out for like gas or whatever. K bye.

David
Pfft you should have marked us down for one person! Saved even more money. We can copy the key.  Travis Hudson might still need a place too. But I think others will have space.

Sounds right for money. We can figure out exact numbers later if we need.

Which nights do we have it for?
